Detailed Description

Group Data about a received message.

contain the data about a received message :

  • the length of the message
  • the message
  • a pointer on the source of the message
  • the PerrId of the sender
  • the id for the message

Definition at line 30 of file Message.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Message::Message ( int  size = 0  ) 

Constructor.

Allocates a size+1 bytes buffer to contains the data of a message (the added byte is kept before the message, so buffer is a pointer on a buffer of length 'size').

Parameters:
size [in] the size of the buffer containing the message if size = 0 (default), no allocation are done. Usefull for pointer container.
